instructions: Put the dinner plate on the table
Put the fork to the left of the dinner plate
Put the dinner fork to the right of the salad fork next to the dinner plate
Put the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate
Place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife.
Put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife
Place the water glass in front right side of the dinner plate
Place the wine glass directly to the right of the water glass.
Place the second wine glass to the right of the other wine glass already placed.
Place the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon.
Place the bread plate directly in front of the dinner fork.
Place the butter knife on the front of the bread plate.
Place the dessert fork sideways in front of the dinner plate and facing the water glass.
Place the dessert spoon in front of the dessert fork and facing the bread plate.
Place the napkin in the center of the dinner plate parallel to the salad knife.
